name: Defend from the asteriods
description:
So,

I built a new game 

basically there's a ship and meteors fall to you and you have to protect your ship by moving your mouse and you can shoot by left click.

If you get bored with the graphics then either edit the pics in the assets folder but do not delete any images from it. I also made made a changed textures for that,  you can download it from here

and send me the pic of your high score.

Mine was 9944........so close to 10000😥😥😭😭😭. and my highest meteors hot was 66.

suggest more ideas in the comments.
